content: BTW I was thinking maybe we could post about stuff we're working on. Like if Quiet makes a big release. Or (self-serving) when I release my map app.
Post where about stuff we're working on? Mastodon? Sure! We could put it on the website too.
I was thinking Mastodon. Maybe we can talk about it on Sunday.
Just for some flavor on the account. To give people a sense of the people they'd be meeting.
Gotcha. Yeah, please remind me. Happy to talk about it Sunday!
